com.xing.api

Class Resource.Factory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xing.api.Resource.Factory
  • Enclosing class:
    Resource

    public abstract static class Resource.Factory
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows Resource creation via a non reflective api.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Factory(java.lang.Class<? extends Resource> resourceCls) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Resource create(XingApi api)
      Creates a resource instance of the class which this factory is attached to.

    • Constructor Detail

        public Factory(java.lang.Class<? extends Resource> resourceCls)

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public abstract Resource create(XingApi api)
        Creates a resource instance of the class which this factory is attached to.

        Implementations should not use XingApi.resource(Class) since it may result in an infinite loop.
